DOC.brief_summary: Post-Market Clinical Follow-up of the new Ilivia ICD Family and the new Plexa right ventricular lead to fulfill requirements by the notified body and to support regulatory approval outside of the CE region
DOC.brief_title: Master Study of the Ilivia ICD Family and the Plexa ICD Lead
